net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.state

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.state.State
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, Controllable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultState

    public abstract class State
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controllable, Renderable
    A class which holds the logic for representing a particular 'state' in a game.
    Since:
    March 6, 2015, 3:03:42 AM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander

      • switchTo

        public abstract void switchTo(java.lang.Object... argv)
        Called internally whenever the associated StateManager is told to switch to this State from another State.
        Parameters:
